Add the column equation_allometry to a census dataframe.

Source: R/drop_bad_equations.R
add_equation.Rd

Add the column equation_allometry to a census dataframe.

add_equation(census, equations, .f = dplyr::inner_join)

Arguments

census

A ForestGEO-like census dataframe, with columns sp dbh.
equations

A dataframe with columns sp and equation_allometry.
.f

A dplyr::*_join() function -- e.g. dplyr::left_join() dplyr::full_join() dplyr::inner_join() (default).

Value

A dataframe.

Examples

equations <- pick_equations(allodb::scbi_species, "species")
add_equation(census = allodb::scbi_tree1, equations)
